TestMetadata.TestDescription: 60-question exam with only real KCSA-level questions across core domains.
TestMetadata.ExamDescription: Simulated exam using realistic KCSA questions only.

Questions.Question: Which of the following is NOT one of the 4Cs of Cloud Native Security?
Questions.Explanation: Culture is not part of the 4Cs (Code, Container, Cluster, Cloud).

Questions.Question: Which of the following are valid security frameworks for cloud-native environments?
Questions.Explanation: OWASP and MITRE ATT&CK are cloud-native security frameworks.

Questions.Question: What is a key benefit of using a managed Kubernetes cloud service?
Questions.Explanation: Managed services handle security patching for control plane.

Questions.Question: What is the purpose of the CIS Kubernetes Benchmark?
Questions.Explanation: The CIS Benchmark provides security configuration guidelines.

Questions.Question: Which Kubernetes component enforces authentication and authorization?
Questions.Explanation: The API server is responsible for authentication and authorization.

Questions.Question: How can Kubelet security be enhanced?
Questions.Explanation: anonymous-auth should be disabled for secure Kubelet configuration.

Questions.Question: Which component in Kubernetes starts and stops containers?
Questions.Explanation: The container runtime handles container lifecycle.

Questions.Question: What is the most restrictive Pod Security Standard level?
Questions.Explanation: Restricted applies tightest security policies.

Questions.Question: Which RBAC resource binds users to roles?
Questions.Explanation: RoleBinding associates subjects with Roles or ClusterRoles.

Questions.Question: What defines a trust boundary in Kubernetes?

Options.C: A boundary requiring validation and control

Questions.Explanation: Trust boundaries separate levels of access and trust.

Questions.Question: What threat is associated with privilege escalation?
Questions.Explanation: Wildcards in RBAC can allow unintended privilege escalation.

Questions.Question: Which of the following helps secure the container supply chain?
Questions.Explanation: SBOM and Cosign help verify and secure images.

Questions.Question: What is the purpose of imagePullSecrets in Kubernetes?

Options.A: To pull secrets from other pods

Questions.Explanation: imagePullSecrets are used to authenticate with private container registries.

Questions.Question: Which framework is used to protect health data in the USA?
Questions.Explanation: HIPAA is used for healthcare data compliance in the US.

Questions.Question: Which of the following are threat modeling frameworks?
Questions.Explanation: MITRE and STRIDE are threat modeling frameworks.
